reasoning: This trade is mutually beneficial as Team A leverages its significant QB depth to acquire a much-needed top-tier WR in Zay Flowers, significantly improving its starting lineup's balance. Team A still retains a strong QB in Justin Herbert. Team B, already rostering the elite Patrick Mahomes II, accepts this trade to acquire Jayden Daniels, a QB with massive upside, consolidating their QB room. They sacrifice their top WR but receive a reliable veteran in Adam Thielen, maintaining solid WR depth while gambling on the higher ceiling of Daniels.
